tool_description: HOPCOMS Rate API gives daily rates of vegetables and fruits sold by HOPCOMS.
name: HOPCOMS
title: HOPCOMS

api_list.name: hopcoms_daily
item_details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hopcoms.p.rapidapi.com/hopcoms_meta/item_details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hopcoms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hopcoms.p.rapidapi.com/hopcoms_meta/item_details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hopcoms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
